name: WiX XML Patch File
summary: Learn about .WIXMSP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: The Pyro tool included in the WiX Toolset uses the WIXMSP file and one or more .WIXMST files to produce a .MSP file.

description: Patch file created by the WiX toolset, a Windows installer development utility; produced when .WIXOBJ files are linked in a patch build; contains the XML output of the linked WIXOBJ files.
